description:
Dark Schneider is revived in resonance with the evil wave of the God of Destruction, Anthrasax. With the power of the spirit of flame, his body is reconstituted, and his magic power is restored. He quickly chants "Helloween! Seven Keys of the Guardian Gods" and "Evil Blaze of Burning Exodus" one after another and corners Abigail and the huge undead being, but... How will this battle with Abigail end?
Source: Official Website
